about_the_game:
Jenny Pitstop Lusby is an ordinary girl with a passion for spaceships, until she discovers that her grandfather is a living legend in intergalactic racing. Now, under the shadow of his extraordinary legacy, Jenny is thrust into a high-speed, challenging saga, fighting to prove she is worthy of his title.

As she prepares for the big race that could define her destiny, she must overcome Merak, her grandfather's cunning rival, whose mechanical traps, armies of robots, and mind-blowing super spaceships threaten to end her journey prematurely.

Navigate through otherworldly landscapes and explore exotic planets in the quirky Pitstop galaxy. Take down Merak's arsenal in each procedurally generated and endless level, develop your skills, upgrade your ship, and become an unbeatable competitor in this captivating racing and shooting game. You won’t want to miss this intergalactic showdown!

Jenny and the Intergalactic Race is a transmedia work in both game and animated children's series, developed by Sinergia Games in co-production with Liberato Cultural Productions.

Now, under the shadow of his extraordinary legacy, Jenny is thrust into a high-speed, challenging saga, fighting to prove she is worthy of his title.

As she prepares for the big race that could define her destiny, she must overcome Merak, her grandfather's cunning rival, whose mechanical traps, armies of robots, and mind-blowing super spaceships threaten to end her journey prematurely.

Navigate through otherworldly landscapes and explore exotic planets in the quirky Pitstop galaxy. Take down Merak's arsenal in each procedurally generated and endless level, develop your skills, upgrade your ship, and become an unbeatable competitor in this captivating racing and shooting game. You won’t want to miss this intergalactic showdown!

Jenny and the Intergalactic Race is a transmedia work in both game and animated children's series, developed by Sinergia Games in co-production with Liberato Cultural Productions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
